title: Getting started
text: ICD-10-PCS codes composed seven alphanumeric characters. character contains 34 possible values. seven characters make complete code specific meanings vary 17 sections manual. value represents specific option general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) 24 letters (-H, J-N, P-Z) may used character. letters O used avoid confusion digits 0 1.

title: Getting started
text: character axis classification specifies information procedure performed. Within defined code range, character specifies type information axis classification. example, fifth axis classification specifies Approach sections 0 4 7 9 system.
code: tibble(   axis = 1:7,   name = c('Section',               'Body System',               'Root Operation',               'Body Part',               'Approach',               'Device',               'Qualifier')) |>    gt() |>    #cols_align(align = 'center') |>    opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |>    opt_table_lines(extent = "all") |>    opt_all_caps() #> Error in opt_all_caps(opt_table_lines(opt_table_font(gt(tibble(axis = 1:7, : could not find function "opt_all_caps"

title: Getting started
code: section() |>    gt() |>    opt_table_lines(extent = "all") #> Error in opt_table_lines(gt(section()), extent = "all"): could not find function "opt_table_lines"

title: Getting started
code: axis("0") #> Error in axis("0"): plot.new has not been called yet

title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Bruce (2023). procedural: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/procedural/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {procedural: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface},   author = {Andrew Bruce},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/procedural/}, }

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/procedural")

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: library(procedural) section() #> # A tibble: 17 × 4 #>     axis name    code  label                                                 #>    <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>                                                 #>  1     1 Section 0     Medical and Surgical                                  #>  2     1 Section 1     Obstetrics                                            #>  3     1 Section 2     Placement                                             #>  4     1 Section 3     Administration                                        #>  5     1 Section 4     Measurement and Monitoring                            #>  6     1 Section 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance #>  7     1 Section 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies                  #>  8     1 Section 7     Osteopathic                                           #>  9     1 Section 8     Other Procedures                                      #> 10     1 Section 9     Chiropractic                                          #> 11     1 Section B     Imaging                                               #> 12     1 Section C     Nuclear Medicine                                      #> 13     1 Section D     Radiation Therapy                                     #> 14     1 Section F     Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology      #> 15     1 Section G     Mental Health                                         #> 16     1 Section H     Substance Abuse Treatment                             #> 17     1 Section X     New Technology

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: section("0") #> # A tibble: 1 × 4 #>    axis name    code  label                #>   <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>                #> 1     1 Section 0     Medical and Surgical pcs("0016070") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name           code  label                                     #>   <chr> <chr>          <chr> <chr>                                     #> 1 1     Section        0     Medical and Surgical                      #> 2 2     Body System    0     Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves #> 3 3     Root Operation 1     Bypass                                    #> 4 4     Body Part      6     Cerebral Ventricle                        #> 5 5     Approach       0     Open                                      #> 6 6     Device         7     Autologous Tissue Substitute              #> 7 7     Qualifier      0     Nasopharynx

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("10D20ZZ") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name           code  label                           #>   <chr> <chr>          <chr> <chr>                           #> 1 1     Section        1     Obstetrics                      #> 2 2     Body System    0     Pregnancy                       #> 3 3     Root Operation D     Extraction                      #> 4 4     Body Part      2     Products of Conception, Ectopic #> 5 5     Approach       0     Open                            #> 6 6     Device         Z     No Device                       #> 7 7     Qualifier      Z     No Qualifier

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("2W0UX0Z") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name           code  label              #>   <chr> <chr>          <chr> <chr>              #> 1 1     Section        2     Placement          #> 2 2     Body System    W     Anatomical Regions #> 3 3     Root Operation 0     Change             #> 4 4     Body Region    U     Toe, Right         #> 5 5     Approach       X     External           #> 6 6     Device         0     Traction Apparatus #> 7 7     Qualifier      Z     No Qualifier

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("3E1938X") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name                 code  label                                        #>   <chr> <chr>                <chr> <chr>                                        #> 1 1     Section              3     Administration                               #> 2 2     Body System          E     Physiological Systems and Anatomical Regions #> 3 3     Root Operation       1     Irrigation                                   #> 4 4     Body System / Region 9     Nose                                         #> 5 5     Approach             3     Percutaneous                                 #> 6 6     Substance            8     Irrigating Substance                         #> 7 7     Qualifier            X     Diagnostic

code: pcs("4B01XVZ") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name              code  label                      #>   <chr> <chr>             <chr> <chr>                      #> 1 1     Section           4     Measurement and Monitoring #> 2 2     Body System       B     Physiological Devices      #> 3 3     Root Operation    0     Measurement                #> 4 4     Body System       1     Peripheral Nervous         #> 5 5     Approach          X     External                   #> 6 6     Function / Device V     Stimulator                 #> 7 7     Qualifier         Z     No Qualifier

what: Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance

what: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
text: Pivot data frame long format easy printing

title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
code: long(df, cols = dplyr::everything())

title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
text: df data frame cols columns pivot long, default dplyr::everything()

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Codes — pcs
code: pcs(x)

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Codes — pcs
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() pcs("0G9000Z") pcs("0016070") pcs("2W0UX0Z") pcs("2W20X4Z") pcs("2W10X7Z") pcs("2W10X6Z") pcs("2W1HX7Z") }

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Section — section
code: section(x = NULL)

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Section — section
text: x ICD-10-PCS section character, alphanumeric code length 1. NULL (default), returns 17 sections.

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Section — section
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() section() section("0") section("2") section("X") }
